birth_place.zh-cn: 中华民国陕西省长安县基督教广仁医院
birth_place.en: Kuang-Jen Hospital, Chang'an County, Shaanxi Province, Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，中国国民党籍，曾任中华民国副总统、行政院院长、台湾省政府主席与中国国民党主席等职。是第二位台湾籍人士出任国民党主席。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China and a member of the Kuomintang. He has served as Vice President of the Republic of China, Premier of the Executive Yuan, Governor of Taiwan Province, and Chairman of the Kuomintang. He was the second Taiwanese person to serve as KMT chairman.

description.zh-cn: 连战的妻子，曾赢得中国小姐选美竞赛。
description.en: Wife of Lien Chan, former Miss China pageant winner.

description.zh-cn: 连战的父亲，曾任中华民国内政部部长。
description.en: Father of Lien Chan, former Minister of the Interior of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 连战的母亲。
description.en: Mother of Lien Chan.

description.zh-cn: 连战的祖父，台湾历史学家，著有《台湾通史》。
description.en: Grandfather of Lien Chan, a Taiwanese historian and author of 'General History of Taiwan'.

description.zh-cn: 连战的长子，台湾政治人物。
description.en: Eldest son of Lien Chan, a Taiwanese politician.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的一所顶尖研究型大学，连战于此获得学士学位并曾在此任教。
description.en: A top research university in Taiwan where Lien Chan obtained his bachelor's degree and later taught.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国芝加哥的私立研究型大学，连战于此获得硕士及博士学位。
description.en: A private research university in Chicago, USA, where Lien Chan received his master's and doctoral degrees.

description.zh-cn: 政治学家，连战在芝加哥大学的博士学位指导教授。
description.en: Political scientist, Lien Chan's doctoral advisor at the University of Chicago.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国主要政党之一，连战曾担任该党主席及荣誉主席。
description.en: One of the major political parties in the Republic of China, where Lien Chan served as Chairman and Honorary Chairman.

en: Premier of the Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华民国行政院的最高首长，由总统任命。
description.en: The head of the Executive Yuan of the Republic of China, appointed by the President.

en: Vice President of the Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华民国备位元首，由人民直接选举产生。
description.en: The deputy head of state of the Republic of China, directly elected by the people.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党的最高领导人。
description.en: The highest leader of the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国前总统，曾是连战的政治搭档，后因2000年总统选举失利而关系产生变化。
description.en: Former President of the Republic of China, who was once Lien Chan's political partner. Their relationship changed after the defeat in the 2000 presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国前总统，民主进步党籍，曾在2000年和2004年两次总统选举中击败连战。
description.en: Former President of the Republic of China and a member of the Democratic Progressive Party. He defeated Lien Chan in the presidential elections of 2000 and 2004.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，曾在2000年脱离国民党参选总统，导致泛蓝分裂；后于2004年与连战搭档竞选。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician who left the KMT to run for president in 2000, causing a split in the Pan-Blue Coalition. He later ran as Lien Chan's running mate in 2004.

description.zh-cn: 前中国共产党中央委员会总书记。2005年与时任中国国民党主席的连战在北京举行了历史性会晤。
description.en: Former General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China. In 2005, he held a historic meeting in Beijing with Lien Chan, who was then the Chairman of the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记，曾与连战多次会面。
description.en: General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, who has met with Lien Chan on multiple occasions.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国第十任总统选举。由于泛蓝阵营分裂，连战最终败给民进党的陈水扁。
description.en: The 10th presidential election of the Republic of China. Due to the split in the Pan-Blue Coalition, Lien Chan ultimately lost to Chen Shui-bian of the DPP.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国第十一任总统选举。连战与宋楚瑜搭档，以微弱差距败给竞选连任的陈水扁，选举前一天发生了319枪击案。
description.en: The 11th presidential election of the Republic of China. Lien Chan and his running mate James Soong were narrowly defeated by the incumbent Chen Shui-bian. The 319 shooting incident occurred the day before the election.

description.zh-cn: 在2004年中华民国总统选举前一天，针对总统候选人陈水扁和副总统候选人吕秀莲的枪击事件，被认为影响了选举结果。
description.en: A shooting incident targeting presidential candidate Chen Shui-bian and vice-presidential candidate Annette Lu on the eve of the 2004 ROC presidential election, which is believed to have influenced the election outcome.

description.zh-cn: 时任中国国民党主席连战率团访问中国大陆，是自1949年后国共两党最高领导人的首次会晤。
description.en: Then-KMT Chairman Lien Chan led a delegation to mainland China, marking the first meeting between the top leaders of the KMT and the CCP since 1949.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的强制性社会保险制度，在连战担任行政院院长任内开办。
description.en: The compulsory social insurance system in the Republic of China, launched during Lien Chan's tenure as Premier of the Executive Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 位于陕西省，是连战的出生地。
description.en: Located in Shaanxi Province, it is the birthplace of Lien Chan.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，2020年中华民国总统选举中国国民党籍候选人。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician, the KMT's candidate in the 2020 Republic of China presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 连战长期服务的国家实体。
description.en: The state entity that Lien Chan served for a long period.

description.zh-cn: 连战于1965年9月5日与连方瑀（原名方瑀）在美国芝加哥大学庞德教堂结婚。
description.en: Lien Chan married Lien Fang-yu (née Fang Yu) on September 5, 1965, at the Bond Chapel of the University of Chicago in the United States.

description.zh-cn: 连震东是连战的父亲。
description.en: Lien Chen-tung is the father of Lien Chan.

description.zh-cn: 赵兰坤是连战的母亲。
description.en: Chao Lan-kun is the mother of Lien Chan.

description.zh-cn: 连横是连震东的父亲，即连战的祖父。
description.en: Lien Heng is the father of Lien Chen-tung, making him Lien Chan's grandfather.

description.zh-cn: 连胜文是连战的长子。
description.en: Sean Lien is the eldest son of Lien Chan.

description.zh-cn: 连战于1936年8月27日出生于中华民国陕西省长安县。
description.en: Lien Chan was born on August 27, 1936, in Chang'an County, Shaanxi Province, Republic of China.

degree.en: Bachelor of Arts in Political Science

description.zh-cn: 1953年自陆军官校转学至国立台湾大学政治系，1957年毕业。
description.en: Transferred from the Military Academy to the Department of Political Science at National Taiwan University in 1953, and graduated in 1957.

degree.zh-cn: 国际公法与外交学硕士、政治学博士
degree.en: Master of Arts in International Public Law and Diplomacy, Doctor of Philosophy in Political Science

description.zh-cn: 连战于1961年和1965年分别在芝加哥大学获得硕士和博士学位。
description.en: Lien Chan received his master's and doctoral degrees from the University of Chicago in 1961 and 1965, respectively.

description.zh-cn: 邹谠是连战在芝加哥大学的博士学位指导教授。
description.en: Tang Tsou was Lien Chan's doctoral advisor at the University of Chicago.

description.zh-cn: 连战是中国国民党党员，并曾担任党主席及荣誉主席。
description.en: Lien Chan is a member of the Kuomintang and has served as its Chairman and Honorary Chairman.

description.zh-cn: 连战在李登辉担任总统期间，先后出任其任命的行政院院长及搭档竞选的副总统。
description.en: During Lee Teng-hui's presidency, Lien Chan served first as the Premier appointed by him, and later as his running mate and Vice President.

description.zh-cn: 在2000年总统大选中，国民党支持者认为时任党主席的李登辉暗助陈水扁，导致连战败选。
description.en: In the 2000 presidential election, KMT supporters believed that then-Chairman Lee Teng-hui secretly supported Chen Shui-bian, leading to Lien Chan's defeat.

description.zh-cn: 陈水扁是连战在2000年及2004年两次总统大选中的主要竞争对手，并均取得胜利。
description.en: Chen Shui-bian was Lien Chan's main competitor in the 2000 and 2004 presidential elections, and won both times.

description.zh-cn: 宋楚瑜脱离国民党独立参选2000年总统，分散了泛蓝票源，是导致连战败选的原因之一。
description.en: James Soong left the KMT to run for president as an independent in 2000, splitting the Pan-Blue vote, which was one of the reasons for Lien Chan's defeat.

description.zh-cn: 2004年总统大选，国民党与亲民党合作，由连战担任总统候选人，宋楚瑜担任其副总统候选人。
description.en: In the 2004 presidential election, the KMT and the People First Party collaborated, with Lien Chan as the presidential candidate and James Soong as his vice-presidential running mate.

description.zh-cn: 连战以中国国民党主席身份率团访问中国大陆，开启了“和平之旅”。
description.en: Lien Chan, as Chairman of the Kuomintang, led a delegation to mainland China, initiating the 'Journey of Peace'.

description.zh-cn: 2005年4月29日，时任中国国民党主席连战与时任中共中央总书记胡锦涛在北京人民大会堂会晤，是国共两党最高领导人自1945年后的首次会晤。
description.en: On April 29, 2005, then-KMT Chairman Lien Chan met with then-CCP General Secretary Hu Jintao at the Great Hall of the People in Beijing. This was the first meeting between the top leaders of the KMT and the CCP since 1945.

description.zh-cn: 连战曾于2013年和2014年等多次与中共中央总书记习近平会面。
description.en: Lien Chan met with CCP General Secretary Xi Jinping on multiple occasions, including in 2013 and 2014.

description.zh-cn: 连战代表中国国民党参选2000年总统，但因泛蓝阵营分裂而败选。
description.en: Lien Chan represented the KMT in the 2000 presidential election but lost due to a split in the Pan-Blue Coalition.

description.zh-cn: 此事件发生在2004年总统选举前一天，被泛蓝阵营认为严重影响选情，导致连战以微弱差距败选。
description.en: This incident occurred the day before the 2004 presidential election and was considered by the Pan-Blue Coalition to have seriously affected the election, leading to Lien Chan's narrow defeat.

description.zh-cn: 全民健康保险制度在连战担任行政院院长任内规划并正式开办。
description.en: The National Health Insurance system was planned and officially launched during Lien Chan's tenure as Premier of the Executive Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 连战允诺出任2020年中华民国总统选举中国国民党籍候选人韩国瑜后援会总会长。
description.en: Lien Chan agreed to serve as the general director of the support club for KMT presidential candidate Han Kuo-yu in the 2020 election.
